Interface Summary
CMLConstants Constants
 

Class Summary

AttributeTest test for attribute.
BaseTest superclass for manage common methods for unit tests
BooleanArrayAttribute attribute representing a boolean value..
BooleanAttribute attribute representing an boolean value.
CMLAttribute generic subclassed Attribute for CML elements.
CMLElement schema-derived atom class
CMLElements<E extends Element> class to manage child elements in similar manner to XOM Elements.
CMLLog generic logfile for CML activities
CMLNamespace manages CML namespaces.
CMLSerializer Serializer for customising CML output
CMLType supports XSD and derived types generated by software and only instantiated as singletons
CMLUtil static utilities to help manage common constructs.
CMLUtilTest test CMLUtil.
DoubleArrayAttribute attribute representing an array of doubles.
DoubleArrayAttributeTest tests for doubleAttribute.
DoubleAttribute attribute representing a double value.
DoubleAttributeTest tests for doubleAttribute.
ElementTest fundamental parsing (not necessarily involved derived classses.

IntAttribute attribute representing an int value.
IntAttributeTest tests for intAttribute.
RTSI This utility class is looking for all the classes implementing or inheriting from a given interface or class.
